TopicTitle: MR Aerospace [New Engines and Fuel types]

Articles.Content:
Tired of normal Engines that burn liquid fuel to fast? or want special jet engines for interplanetary missions? Well this pack by MR Aerospace incorporates new fuels like Tellarium52 (A Nuclear element) and Hydrogen , As well as new parts (New textures coming soon) to accommodate for the new fuels and brand new electricity generators! Pack still under heavy development and any help/suggestions are welcome!

Email: [email protected]

Skype:Cyberbug101

KerbalSpacePort: MrROFLWafflez

KerbalSpaceport Mod Page: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mr-aerospace-pack-0-21-1-modified-engines-and-parts/

Whats new: Added 5 new planes!, minor bug fixes, updated to 0.22.

Planned features: New textures (Help Requested), New sounds, New fuels, add parts to career mod tech tree, more planes and crafts for machinima makers and video producers, more visual effects and more all coming soon!

How to install: Just Drag and drop the file into the Gamedata directory in the KSP folder! The final product should be: KSP/Gamedata/MR_Aerospace.

Fuels:

Tellurium52: Tellurium52 Is a real life nuclear element sometimes used in RTG's and as other nuclear fuels. It can also be used to create thermal energy for engine power and is harnessed in the Engines this mod adds!

Hydrogen Gas: Hydrogen is compressed and stored in a tank along with Tellurium52 and is released in bursts as a gas form and can be harnessed for fuels and as monopropellent!

Plutonium:(Coming Soon)

Crafts:

Reaper XLI

The Reaper XLI is by far the best plane so far and is capable of many things such as verticle take off and landing (VTOL), Orbital recon, science, the ability to carry over twice its own body weight without struggle including weapons and fuel tanks and much more. It has also earned the achievement of being the best plane i have ever made and is by far my favourite! (Lol)

Scythe XLI (Fighter Jet)

The Scythe XLI is a reliable, fast and agile fighter jet capable of fast maneuvers, strong lifting and bombing/weapon runs to suit all playing styles! (Warning! Super fast!)

C-1 Pigeon (Crew Transport)

The C-1 Pigeon is a very fast and agile crew transport craft but is also very small for maneuverability and speed so...... yeah!

C-2 Dolphin (Bomber)

The C-2 Dolphin is not capable of really high speeds buts is maneuverable and a strong flier capable of lifting twice its own body weight so feel free to add your weapons!

C-3 Bat (Fighter Jet)

The C-3 Bat is a fast and strong fighter jet with unusual shaped wings but still none the less, a good reliable plane!

C-4 Yellowtail (Fighter Jet)

The C-4 Yellowtail is a High-Speed and agile Fighter Jet fitted with Dual Tellurium52k Burning engines and is capable of high Mach Speeds and Orbital Recon!

V 1.3 Download: http://www./?tjdjjqmho0pi2ar

im still working on this pack and im uploading the parts not so dont be negative ok! anyways the x15 parts will come soon, youll see
